about_the_game:
In Seed to Leaf, players take on the role of Ginko, a lonely wanderer that recently made the worst mistake of their life. With one arm less and new plant powers, Ginko has to collect six seeds from nature spirits in order to right what they have wronged and replant a devastated garden. Along the way Ginko must fight corrupted enemies, re-connect communities that have been drifting apart and solve the mystery of a whole specie slowly disappearing.

Features


Zelda-like 2D Gameplay
Experience a captivating action-adventure reminiscent of classics like Unsighted, Hyper Light Drifter, Eastward, and Tunic.

Modern Pixel Art Graphics
Enjoy a visually impressive world brought to life with handcrafted pixel art graphics that are both nostalgic and contemporary.

Utopian World
Explore a world that has risen again after a devastating catastrophe and emerged stronger, warmer and closer than before.

Deep Lore
From conscious energy refusing to be industrialised to the creation and recent disappearances of nature spirits, the world of Seed to Leaf is filled with fantastical stories waiting to be explored.

Plant Powers
Utilize unique abilities to combat enemies and manipulate the environment while striving to restore harmony to nature.

Community Connections
Experience resilient, welcoming communities, connect individuals and communities with each other and improve their relationships to the natural world.

Complex Characters
Get to know Ginko and the people around them, from the world they long to live in to their deepest insecurities and how they got shaped by them.[/list]

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8600 or AMD Phenom II X4 945
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 230 or Nvidia GeForce GT 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD FX 4300 or Intel Core i3 2120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 340X or Nvidia GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
